name: com.rossogames.rossoforge-popups
description: A modular and extensible popup system for Unity. Designed with clean architecture principles (MVP, interfaces, event-driven), Rossoforge Popups allows developers to easily create, present, and manage popup windows with full control over their lifecycle and interaction behavior. Ideal for confirmation dialogs, alerts, input prompts, and more

samples.description: Contains the base prefab and animator controller used in all popups
Popup's Template ready to adapt, implements a variant of the base popup. Requires 'Popup Essentials'
Contains the animation assets to give the fade in/out effect when opening and closing the popup
Contains the animation assets to give the size in/out effect when opening and closing the popup
Contains a demonstration of how to use the popup. Requires 'Popup Essentials', 'Popup Template', and at least one animation sample.
